thread.section_title: Beyond The Office Door - BTOD.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Beyond The Office Door - BTOD.com | btod.com
thread.title: TMiller
thread.title_full: Beyond The Office Door - BTOD.com reviewed by TMiller

author: TMiller
title: TMiller
text:
I needed large comfortable chairs for our waiting room. I was having a difficult time reading reviews and skipping between different internet sites.
I finally used the feature where I could connect virtually and spoke with a very helpful associate as he gave me an onsite view of these chairs.
They are wonderful! Very heavy, well made....can be wiped off....have arms and can hold a 400 pounder!
Very helpful customer service! I recommend this site.
